column2: [From.GetTitledName] has decided to hold a great Furusiyya martial competition. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] has sent invitations out to warriors across the land. This brings glory and virtue to House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] in the sight of Allah. May He guide the righteous with a mighty victory!

[From.GetTitledName] has been declared the first champion of a great Furusiyya martial competition. So says the Qur'an, "Allah will forgive for you the sins of your past and future and complete His favor upon you and guide you with a mighty victory."
A mighty victory indeed for House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
[From.GetTitledName] has been declared the second champion of a great Furusiyya martial competition! [From.GetFirstName] brings glory to all of House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
[From.GetTitledName] has won the place of third champion in a great Furusiyya martial competition! House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] is truly favored by Allah!

Your [eloper.GetSonDaughter] [eloper.GetFirstName] has eloped with the notorious mercenary [From.GetFirstName]. While their union may not be legitimate, it is said that [From.GetFirstName] has [eloper.GetObjectPronoun] wrapped around [From.GetPossPronoun] fingers.
column3: Votre [eloper.GetSonDaughter] [eloper.GetFirstName] a fui avec le célèbre mercenaire [From.GetFirstName].
column4: Euer/Eure [eloper.GetSonDaughter] [eloper.GetFirstName] ist mit dem berüchtigten Söldner [From.GetFirstName] durchgebrannt.
column6: Tu [eloper.GetSonDaughter] [eloper.GetFirstName] se fugó con el famoso mercenario [From.GetFirstName].

column2: The feast will begin in November.
The fair will begin in May.
The hunt will begin in September.
